com.msgilligan.ethereum.rpc

Class EthereumClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.msgilligan.jsonrpc.AbstractRPCClient
      • com.msgilligan.jsonrpc.RPCClient
        • com.msgilligan.ethereum.rpc.EthereumClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UntypedRPCClient

    public class EthereumClient
extends RPCClient

    A partial implementation of an Ethereum RPC Client

    How to mine just a little for "reg test mode" in Eth: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/wiki/bitchin-tricks See also: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/wiki/Management-APIs
